greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: L.g.f.: log(Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^prime(k))) = Sum_{n>=1} a(n)*x^n/n.
mathematica: nmax = 75; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Log[Product[(1 + x^Prime[k]), {k, 1, nmax}]], {x, 0, nmax}],x] Range[0, nmax]]
nmax = 75; Rest[CoefficientList[Series[Sum[Prime[k] x^Prime[k]/(1 + x^Prime[k]), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Mar 13 2018
